title.narrative: Apoyo a la nueva estructura organizacional municipios

description.narrative: Este proyecto se vincula con la agenda de descentralización del país, que impulsa el Gobierno de Chile y que fortalece el accionar de los municipios, gobiernos regionales y la esfera pública a nivel subnacional.

title.narrative: Social and Environmental Screening Procedure

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.D

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.A

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.1.1

description.narrative: National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
